page.title: 17The Manor House. Markyate.
page.content: {MARKYATE CELL} In Markyate there is a Tudor Manor House.It used to be a monastery. There is a famous story connected with it. George Ferrers bought the Manor estate in 1548 A.D. and gave it the name Markyate Cell.He had an ancestor called Kathleen Ferrers who was better known as "The Wicked Lady".She used to rob the stage coaches on the Watling Street.She changed in a secret room in the cell into a three cornered hat and a cloak.She held up quite a lot of coaches.Once she tried to hold up a coach but the driver shot her.She struggled back to the cell.The next morning they found her in a pool of blood.They bricked up her bedroom and the staircase .The Wicked Lady is said to appear by the bricked up door and
